2018-11-20 14:08:44	Forwarded connection refused by server: Connect failed [Connection refused]

	)
);

SELECT id, idplace, idauteur, note, date_review, date_visit, langue FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid IN (
	83250,79567,54892,78624,47961,82574,78913,62838,47941,73895,73155,72676,58462,75347,62123,59227,80578,75351,74156,57104,48176,66728,82498,66242,80055,71741,72108,56084,70458,60734,53317,56561,72673,77339,62878,75227,78308,73273,71397,60065,82475,64810,73876,81351,70339,61346,58069,56225,65392,61883,73945,73801,79466,81062,83331,71400,63420,58571,58329,63768,63873,67247,64938,74591,78865,53504,58642,56233,57106,61499,53786,80580,62283,77967,57453,65062,55554,53812,61349,66891,58032,74412,73373,83330,47420,66502,83324,50815,81248,83036,65532,57336,67825,55244,58104,60925,49876,62297,57413,81632,60930,67191,78607,69320,49608,63821,76297,73132,68708,71008,74070,63372,51978,63967,63997,82576,65870,57840,76677,75340,67413,65458,48114,70505,60502,60660,55382,56626,65178,76534,81376,62604,49216,83057,68944,73233,73877,74019,77098,57723,60205,50425,65387,73501,74864,76889,54601,67609,81777,80827,55076,75456,65481,74289,78220,69501,77566,72678,81286,59945,82167,56468,60067,67959,61602,77916,69145,61151,77242,82433,62854,60424,71682,72187,62847,57258,57414,73591,68660,64342,73170,80163,69124,73902,77709,58350,60739,50124,70007,68281,76932,72814,53107,81219,65063,73655,77863,83183,75352,67647,76100,60038,76907,48942,78741,67921,66765,72023,67042,65525,57134,66763,66869,64315,76548,72006,73237,54034,68583,64076,48456,69318,74674,76709,77128,82435,71742,79507,77966,52887,68550,71595,72674,80543,71257,70512,79724,60422,67945,81491,82917,54798,74339,71473,60098,52996,58789,49342,68430,68580,81065,72369,81077,47003,67505,53251,81829,66198,52687,65930,61127,81290,53843,64324,72594,61861,81716,73851,53804,67080,81701,59401,69862,74481,73600,61749,80162,74478,68585,54301,53288,74518,53888,81123,74865,74211,61078,69286,75629,83326,52193,61512,75827,67084,58747,66562,69861,69101,52689,69859,68035,75483,75466,74949,55749,52694,72424,56305,69024,79563,76547,76992,51506,75134,56193,58961,74848,70295,79505,71905,61664,49298,71472,59054,66595,73172,51066,53980,78404,78309,65526,61013,83064,7 	)
) LIMIT 100;


**************** DATE REVIEWS *******
2002-02-21 2016-12-09


******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
************************** COURCHEVEL ****************************************
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************

******************** PLACES ****************************
SELECT * FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid IN (
53660, 50882
);

OU  

SELECT id, nom, url, nbAvis, latitude, longitude, shape_gid, gtrip FROM touristflow.tripadvisor WHERE shape_gid IN (
53660, 50882
);

**************** REVIEWS *****************************
SELECT id, idplace, idauteur, note, date_review, date_visit, langue FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid IN (
	53660, 50882
	)
);

**************** DATE REVIEWS *******
2003-07-04 2016-12-08
SELECT MIN(date_review) AS "Minimum", MAX(date_review) AS "Maximum" FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid IN (
	53660, 50882
	)
) AND date_review != '0000-00-00';


******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
************************** LA GRANDE MOTTE *********************************** 43.5685394142, 4.0758328467
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************

******************** PLACES ****************************
SELECT * FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 72663 ;

OU 

SELECT id, nom, url, nbAvis, latitude, longitude, shape_gid, gtrip FROM touristflow.tripadvisor  WHERE shape_gid = 72663 ;

**************** REVIEWS *****************************
SELECT id, idplace, idauteur, note, date_review, date_visit, langue FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 72663 
);

**************** DATE REVIEWS *******
2004-05-11 2016-12-04


******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
************************** REIMS ****************************************
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************

******************** PLACES ****************************
SELECT * FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 71233;

OU  

SELECT id, nom, url, nbAvis, latitude, longitude, shape_gid, gtrip FROM touristflow.tripadvisor WHERE shape_gid = 71233;

**************** REVIEWS *****************************
SELECT id, idplace, idauteur, note, date_review, date_visit, langue FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 71233
);

**************** DATE REVIEWS *******
2002-11-14 2016-12-07
SELECT MIN(date_review) AS "Minimum", MAX(date_review) AS "Maximum" FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 71233
) AND date_review != '0000-00-00';

******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
************************** LILLE ****************************************
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************

******************** PLACES ****************************
SELECT * FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 52094;

OU  

SELECT id, nom, url, nbAvis, latitude, longitude, shape_gid, gtrip FROM touristflow.tripadvisor WHERE shape_gid = 52094;

**************** REVIEWS *****************************
SELECT id, idplace, idauteur, note, date_review, date_visit, langue FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 52094
);

**************** DATE REVIEWS *******
2002-11-03 2016-12-09
SELECT MIN(date_review) AS "Minimum", MAX(date_review) AS "Maximum" FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 52094
) AND date_review != '0000-00-00';


******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
************************** BORDEAUX ****************************************
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************

******************** PLACES ****************************
SELECT * FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 48328;

OU  

SELECT id, nom, url, nbAvis, latitude, longitude, shape_gid, gtrip FROM touristflow.tripadvisor WHERE shape_gid = 48328;

**************** REVIEWS *****************************
SELECT id, idplace, idauteur, note, date_review, date_visit, langue FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 48328
);

**************** DATE REVIEWS *******
2003-01-03 2016-12-09
SELECT MIN(date_review) AS "Minimum", MAX(date_review) AS "Maximum" FROM touristflow.tripadvisor_reviews WHERE idplace IN (
	SELECT id FROM touristflow.tripadvisorShort WHERE shape_gid = 48328
) AND date_review != '0000-00-00';


******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
*********************** REVIEWS TOTAL VOLUME *********************************
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
select extract(year from date_review) as yr, extract(month from date_review) as mon,
       sum(id)
from `touristflow`.`tripadvisor_reviews`
group by extract(year from date_review), extract(month from date_review)
order by yr, mon;

******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
**************************** REMARQUES ***************************************
******************************************************************************
******************************************************************************
